website_summaries.verdict: This set includes everything you'll need to properly display your beautiful new decanter.
pros: The set comes with everything you'll need: a decanter, 6 glasses, and a serving tray
Stopper is glass and contains no plastic
The decanter and glasses shine beautifully when displayed on the reflective silver tray
Decanter is heavy but easy to hold and pour
cons: Glass has a small but, visible seem in it

customer_reviews.title: Housewarming Win
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend's housewarming. He was absolutely thrilled. I'd initially bought this set at Belk with only 4 glasses and no tray for $50. After I saw this, I returned that set and bought this one instead. For slightly less, I got two more glasses and a tray. Excellent housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: LBar

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Set at any Price!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was very pleased with the set. The glasses and the decanter were heavy and the design is exactly as it was advertised. I also read several reviews that talked about a seam in the glasses but if there is a seam, it is not readily visible. I ordered this as a Christmas gift, but ordered another set to keep. I definitely recommend this whiskey set
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mann

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun everyday set for not very much money
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun everyday set for not very much money. You can see seams but still it brightens up a cabinet and gives us useable glasses that don't break the bank. I bought two sets, one for me, and one for my son and his wife, and they loved theirs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Decanter great, cups could be better
customer_reviews.text: The decanter is just fine, nice and durable. I would say the glasses are sturdy too. One problem: every one of the glasses has a line running from top to bottom, making them look cheap. Perhaps my glasses were faulty, but that's been my experience with these guys -- and I'm not really happy about it. But otherwise it's pretty cheap and a good price for all the pieces you get. But if you're displaying them, adjust the arrangement of the cups so the lines aren't visible :)
customer_reviews.author: Julio Giovonni Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS LEAD
customer_reviews.text: While this set is well-made and nice to look at, I was concerned about the lead content after reading about the dangers of consuming beverages from leaded crystal. I didn't notice any indication on the packaging that the set contained lead, so I contacted the manufacturer. They told me that the set does indeed contain lead, and that liquids should not be stored in the crystal overnight. I wish I had known this before purchasing. Now it's more of a display piece than a functional decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set at a reasonable price. The tray is pretty flimsy is the only reason for the low rating. Honestly most people will probably just leave the tray sitting as part of a decorative set so it doesn’t really impact. I saw in other reviews and noticed on my set there is a line going through each of the glasses. It’s not great but really not bothersome either. I think for the price it’s not something to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Pyron

customer_reviews.title: Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Felt a little mixed about ordering after seeing some reviews about receiving broken glass, however that didn't happen to us. Fast delivery, great for bar decor. Reasonably priced, pictures don't do justice. If you're looking to snag a great whiskey set without breaking the bank -- you found it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Souza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful, I am giving it to my boyfriend for his birthday... he is a huge bourbon fan. This will look SO GREAT in his apartment bar, I am so glad that I found it! Only issue is that there was a set of five pieces packaged in the main box with image on it... and two extra glasses were put into the larger box by themselves, I did not like this at all, it looks a little tacky giving him the set like this, not to mention an easy way for the glasses to break. They didn't break so i can't complain. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my husband for homecoming after a deployment. He loves it. Some other reviews stated that their order came with two of the glasses package separate but ours all came in one box. Glasses and decanter are a nice weight. They feel good in your hand. I was worried that the stopper on the decanter would be lightweight but I was pleasantly surprised by its heft and durability. The tray is very plain and basic. It goes well with our decor because we don't need an elaborate tray to upstage the glasses, decanter, and most importantly what is in them.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Eraser

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set. Well worth the price. The seller was very responsive to a minor delivery issue and I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.L

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as pictured. Very beautiful & a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce DiDonato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The quality is absolutely amazing. I got this last year and it’s still in perfect condition, and stunning. Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Scotch with style
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to show on my liquor cabinet and for special toasting events. Made me think of Downton Abby and how I can have a little style to my social gatherings and cocktail hours.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hamilton-Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, presentable budget decanter set
customer_reviews.text: This set is very value for money for its price and presentation. This will make a great budget gift for occasions like birthday, anniversary. I highly recommend it. There are of course many delightful other options available, but they are significantly at a higher price point.
customer_reviews.author: Damayanti Chakraborty

customer_reviews.title: A very nice bar set
customer_reviews.text: After reading the 6 reviews, I decided to order this set. We are single malt scotch drinkers and wanted something that looked very nice sitting out on the countertop. This set is just what we wanted! I was a little apprehensive about the glass size and how it felt to hold, but we all agreed that they were perfect! Very nice crystal decanter that seems to sparkle under the light. The tray is nice but nothing fancy. I know we will enjoy this for many years. A good buy, good price, and received it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this except it did not come with a chrome trade as promised
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price! Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased for my father in law as he is a big scotch drinker. He loved it! You can tell the crystal was pressed and not blown. It doesn't give any details how much lead is in it. However, he plans to use it for aestic viewing. I have to say the shipping was very fast from the company. We got it four days before the actual date.
customer_reviews.author: RyG

customer_reviews.title: A truly amazing set
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift that was 100% well received! The only suggestion I would give is to rinse it out before each use due to the higher lead content. That is basically the price you pay for the stunning look of it all, since the lead makes the crystal shine brighter.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set- it was exactly what we expected. I like that it came with 6 glasses. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Dublin Whiskey Bar Set is an elegant way to display adult beverages in the crystal decanter and makes serving easy with matching glassware that all sit on the Godinger Silver Tray. Really enjoying this lovely Crystal set that matches my other crystal stemware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bought them as a gift for a friend whos grandfather ...
customer_reviews.text: bought them as a gift for a friend whos grandfather left his whiskey set to his brother. When he opened the box he was convinced they were identical. The grandfathers were from Ireland and were passed down for years prior. Hopefully these will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Christina E.

customer_reviews.title: Bangin' Bar Set
customer_reviews.text: The thing we don't realize, when we make online purchases, is that numbers never lie! You know what the cost is. Yes! You know how many items you're getting. Yes! But the measurements? The size we see versus the size we get... I purchased a similar item from a different buyer and was fooled. Sent it back and then got this bangin' bar set! The old items looked just like their picture: Small, miniscule and perfect for a dollhouse. These items not only came in on time but arrived with such beauty and shimmering luminosity I nearly forgot this was a second purchase. Perfectly shipped, perfectly packed, and accurately descriptive up close: Godinger's crystal! "Bangin'ly beautiful!"
customer_reviews.author: jerseyjamaican

customer_reviews.title: beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a bar tray for quite some time now and I am extremely satisfied I came across this tray set. The product was packaged well for shipping. You get one decanter in one box and 4 glasses in one box with two other separate glasses packaged individually and the tray is included. The glass quality to me is good enough. I think it's advertised as some crystal but I dont remember all I know is i am happy with my product. The tray is beautiful. the whole set just shines and it looks great on my bar. This product was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: cms76

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for our son who was decorating a bar area in his small apartment. He loved it. It catches the light and looks beautiful on his bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks really nice. I bought this because I have a small ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks really nice. I bought this because I have a small whisky barrel to age my whiskies longer if I desired and I wanted a place to put my aged whisky so I could start aging other whiskies quicker. Iti have read some reviews saying it isn't real crystal but either way the set looks really nice and all the pieces were delivered in 1 box set contrary to what others have said. The silver tray is really nice looking and does make all the pieces come together. I like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift. When my brother opened it it was broken. I had the replacement in 3 days, great service, thank you and my brother loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lovse

customer_reviews.title: paired with a nice bottle of bourbon
customer_reviews.text: This set, paired with a nice bottle of bourbon, made a beautiful wedding gift for the groom.
customer_reviews.author: Froggie

customer_reviews.title: ... as his first proper whisky set and he absolutely loved it! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a buddy as his first proper whisky set and he absolutely loved it! Great quality, a real solid crystal whiskey set would diffidently buy one again as a gift (I already have one). Very happy, what a whisky set should look and feel like. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: 2Big Mutts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bar set!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and it was perfect. The service from the vendor was great. I received it earlier than expected and it was packed properly. I have a similar bar set for myself that is close to this one but it cost a great deal more. I wish I would have found this one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: M Bourassa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived with a chip in a glass (it happens), returned it and the new one was sent with no defects! It was a gift and it was accepted with super high gratitude! It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: sirBrently

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected. This is my second purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. This is my second purchase of this item. The first was a gift for a friend. No I needed one also.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, the tray is super reflective and the glasses are heavy and look good. The only thing better than this would have to be something many times more expensive, you can't go wrong with this as a gift. Reading around though I should warn that leaving alcohol in crystal for long periods of time can be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Wienert

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He adored the quality and the weight of the crystal. Lovely gift.
customer_reviews.author: SmartCookie

customer_reviews.title: Fine crystal that does not cost an arm and a leg! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my father, he loves it and adds a nice addition to his bar as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of glasses we got here
customer_reviews.text: The crystal set is beautiful but my cap came kinda cloudy for some reason and it knocks off the ambiance of the rest of the set. I'm gonna probably get another decanter. Anyways it's still a nice set and I think I'm the only one that had this problem so your chances of getting a good cap for your decanter is good!
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I wish a 12+ year whiskey came as a compliment to this set =] Hopefully this review comes with a later shipment... Hint Hint
customer_reviews.author: Luke Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. He absolutely loved it. It is great quality and very durable. Having 6 glasses is very nice incase there is an accident. Glasses are also big enough to fit an ice whiskey ball if used.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: awesome product! this thing is amazing for the price. it is soild and looks and feels like a set that would be hundreds $. you will not be disappointed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: justin jones

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: After a while the glitter disappeared and now just looks like old bottle
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arunga

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my father's birthday, he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone else, but are happy with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle issue
customer_reviews.text: The bottle don’t close properly and the liquid losses sense
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Genao

customer_reviews.title: Classy whiskey bar set
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this whiskey bar set! As you can see we filled already and waiting for our guests to enjoy!! Very classy, durable. Just perfect♥️
customer_reviews.author: pam baldwin

customer_reviews.title: decanter set
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% pleased with this item. It is beautiful and much nicer than expected. Great QUAILTY CRYSTAL it was packaged nicely, nothing was damaged. Price is better than affordable, I am looking forward to using this product.Recieved in a timely manner. I am very picky and I looked for a decanter set for a long time and debated on purchasing this one.I would recomend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, perfect for every day use
customer_reviews.text: Just the right weight, has a good feel to it. Definitely a great purchase.*****
customer_reviews.author: ontheknoll

customer_reviews.title: Bought for husband for Christmas. He absolutely loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband for Christmas. He absolutely loves it, and even though I don't drink it does look very fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my family friend based on the good reviews and he loved it
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for my family friend based on the good reviews and he loved it! very nice! might even buy one for myself.. and i dont even drink! ha!
customer_reviews.author: HappinessxReviews

customer_reviews.title: Wow.....very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my husband. We have a bar in our great room, and I know he mentioned wanting a good decanter set to display. This set was excellant. It's very durable and sturdy, and ALL glass. There is no plastic or rubber parts anywear on the decanter itself. The glasses are beautiful, and there are 6 of them. The tray is also pretty nice, it's a good tray, and not flimsy at all. The product was well packaged, and arrived quickly and undamaged. This is an excellant set, I paid around $80 shipped for it, and it looks so much more expensive. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Z

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy
customer_reviews.text: It is a classy looking set, however it does not match the other not classy stuff that I own. Consider whether you need this or just think you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick D Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: Decanter
customer_reviews.text: I like this purchase. It is not expensive crystal but it is a decent looking set. For the price, this is a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: VERY Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived SUPER fast and I absolutely love the quality. Product included two individually wrapped glasses, a boxed set of four of the same glasses (kind of weird), the scotch holder, and the tray. The top of the holder does seem to fit somewhat loose where it seems if someone were to get a little too sauced and knock it over your favorite whiskey would be all over the bar. I'm afraid to tighten the top because it's so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WOW a really nice set great price for the money
customer_reviews.author: Henry Crockett

customer_reviews.title: " What a great addition, to the space
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item, for our new "bar room." What a great addition, to the space. The quality is superb. There was extra care taken, in the packaging of this product, which was greatly appreciated. Crystal can sometimes be fragile. Everything arrived in pristine and perfect condition. So pleased with this product...
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Makes me lok like Royalty
customer_reviews.text: just beautiful. My nieces do not want to use anything else but these glasses. I told them that they are for cognac, cocktails and liquor and they do not care... they just love them.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. J.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliance display Crystal
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crystal really accentuates my bar. Have placed Center and the natural light of the room highlights the brilliant cut of the Crystal creating a sparkling Kaleidoscope effect. Was impressed when I first saw it very beautiful
customer_reviews.author: P. Parker

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than I expected - this is such a great set
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: It is a great prize and a great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these as gifts for a golf tournament. It is a great prize and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Blakeney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, it looks amazing in my bar, it is sturdy yet delicate
customer_reviews.author: Miriam V Urquiaga

customer_reviews.title: Solid Set
customer_reviews.text: The set is as advertised. Good, heavy crystal. Bought it as a gift and my brother is looking forward to filling it up. Overall good product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: John Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He loves it. This is a very heavy and attractive set. The crystal almost glows in the light. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set. Given as a gift and was
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Given as a gift and was loved
customer_reviews.author: Linda Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous gift for husband.
customer_reviews.text: This set is gorgeous, heavy, and will be a great addition to my husbands basement bar. The top is made of crystal too and not plastic like some of the other sets. I'm very happy with this purchase and so was my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Braden

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a man
customer_reviews.text: Feel like a man and buy this. Looks great and feels great when you pour yourself a glass of straight Kentucky Bourban. Don't be a sissy, drink whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: David Duhaime

customer_reviews.title: The Set is Gorgeous! But I was Missing Pieces...
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up if you're ordering from Chestnut gifts- I was missing the tray and 2 glasses. I read some other reviews mentioning that they were packaged separately..but I still never received them. Thankfully, they're giving me a refund for the missing items. Anyway, the decanter itself and the 4 glasses I did receive are beautiful. Like most everyone has said, it's heavy, excellent quality and looks fabulous in our liquor cabinet with lights :) My husband is very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: KLG

customer_reviews.title: WAY nicer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: My parents gave this as a gift to my husband and me for our fourth anniversary (crystal) and we were AMAZED at the quality for under $100. I think they paid around $65? Everything has a good heft to it and the decanter is just gorgeous - the glass-on-glass stopper makes that awesome clinking sound and we feel like we're in Mad Men or Boardwalk Empire. We expected the tray to be a throwaway POS but it's actually beautiful and very shiny and it's sitting out with the set in our liquor hutch now. If you're contemplating this purchase, GO FOR IT. It's seriously amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D. Goon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: It's not Waterford, but it is beautiful and great quality for the price. It is nice, heavy, crystal - my husband who knows nothing about homewares was really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: kitchenelectricsjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent decanter set. Not only is the set attractive, but it is heavy and durable. It makes a lovely addition to our drinks table.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: OK For the Money
customer_reviews.text: You know you get what you pay for. I have no complaints with this set. It was as advertised. Not top of th eline but for everyday cocktails you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased as a gift and it displays beautifully. Now we are debating if we really want ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and it displays beautifully. Now we are debating if we really want to part with it. We might be purchasing another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Quality at value
customer_reviews.text: It was a quality product and good value for money
customer_reviews.author: bill bookless

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to my makeshift office book-shelf bar, the silver tray adds a touch of extra class.
customer_reviews.author: BigLou

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Great addition to any home bar! However, I would recommend the packaging be improved. 2 of the glasses are just wrapped with paper in the box causing the rim of one of the glasses to be chipped.
customer_reviews.author: hpycustomer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a gift. It was VERY well accepted and like by not only the birthday boy but all who saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Sneezy 5

customer_reviews.title: Excellent All Around
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent as was the Customer Service. Due to a misunderstanding, we thought that the set came with six, not four and when informed of this they immediately offered to rectify the situation. We would love to purchase something from this company again to reward them for their superb Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Elegant set
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift to my husband, Delivered quick and the set it great! Nothing broken or scratched and great quality. Husband absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bailey

customer_reviews.title: glasses
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my husband. he loves it. he uses it every day. he has it displayed in our living room.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father in law. Very good quality

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My father received this for christmas. No waterford but seriously nice for the price the tray reveals incredible detail and shine.

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Class for cheap! They make me feel like I am a baron or something.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The crystal looked good but two of the glasses were cracked
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my bf's Christmas present. It arrived on time for Christmas. The set is very classy and looks just like the picture online. The durable crystal is a very impressive gift. The tray that it comes with is also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for a friend's wedding shower. It's great that it came all in one package and the quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Good looking.  Very functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking product that is very functional. One reviewer noted that the sound of the stopper being put in the decanter makes a very wonderful sound.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Dad & FIL love them!
customer_reviews.text: Gave a set each to both my dad and father-in-law. They love them! Gorgeous pieces and so well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: Great set, bad shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The bar set is great, but it arrived with one of my glasses broken! That’s why this got 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: ER nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set for my scotch. It looks nice on the counter and the quality seems very good. Had for a while now and the glasses hold up very well in the dishwasher as well.
customer_reviews.author: Action

customer_reviews.title: Great item, not on time
customer_reviews.text: This set was amazing! It was a gift for my dads birthday and he was overjoyed to receive it. However, because the seller shipped with UPS the package arrived four days late and missed his party. Dealing with UPS inorder to get this item was quite a pain the behind that could have been avoid if the seller put the correct apartment number on the item. :( Never the less, great product that was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my husband, he loves honey whiskey and this was perfect and absolutely beautiful. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: very classy and a great addition to any bar set
customer_reviews.text: got as a gift for my husband. He loves it! very classy and a great addition to any bar set.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Give it to my son he was very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: noeleen roe

customer_reviews.title: Chelle
customer_reviews.text: My husband really loved our third year anniversary gift of crystal. However if you are looking for a delicate crystal this one is not thin, it is very thick. We love our new set!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift and it shipped really promptly and arrived before scheduled. I am very pleased this this company and the quality of their product. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jat

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift and it is stunning in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and it is stunning in itself. It really shines after a quick wash with dish soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the prize! Everyone thinks I paid a fortune for them!
customer_reviews.author: Josilyne

customer_reviews.title: and it was even better than I thought it was going to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, and it was even better than I thought it was going to be. He loves it, and it got here earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a whiskey lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as our wedding gift and he absolutely adores it. The crystal glasses and decanter are beautiful and high quality. The tray is cheap and scratches very easily, but I didn't buy the set for the tray. Make sure to hand wash these beautiful pieces so as to prevent any spots or damage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Weiand

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of this product. I ordered it for my dad for a Christmas gift and he can't stop staring at it. I would recommend for any man that likes Whiskey :)
customer_reviews.author: AndiCHI

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Some imperfections in the glass, but a great deal for the price. Came with everything advertised, including the platter.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: whiskey decnter set
customer_reviews.text: This product came fast and I am VERY pleased with it. It is beautiful and was packaged very well. There was no way anything could be broken. It looks beautiful set up and well worth the money. Very please...I reccomend that anyone interested should buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: krysta33

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: It was in perfect condition when it quickly arrived, and it was amazing quality. Have this as a gift and the receiver was very pleased. It's already holding whiskey on his bar.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Williams

product_meta.title: Dublin Whiskey Bar Set - Includes Whisky Decanter, 6 Old Fashioned Tumbler Glasses and Mirrored Display Tray
product_meta.description: Dublin Whiskey Bar Set - Includes Whisky Decanter, 6 Old Fashioned Tumbler Glasses and Mirrored Display Tray
feature_bullets: Dublin Collection decanter offers a beautiful way to serve your favorite Whiskey Scotch Bourbon Vodka or Wine.
Lead Free Crystal - Set Includes 1 Decanter, 6 drinking glasses and mirrored serving tray.

Since 1973 Godinger has specialized in handcrafted silver, pewter, crystal, stainless, and alternative metal giftware. From wedding gifts, candlesticks, barware, bakeware, tea sets and frames, you are sure to find the perfect item for any special occasion. Godinger products are available at all major retailers across the US and Canada.
